languages.text: "Что же, теперь вы знаете, что покупаете. Ситуация непростая, но, если вы окажете мне поддержку, вы забудете о том, что есть другие торговые узлы помимо Футфола. Потому что нигде у вас не будет более верных друзей, чем здесь".

traits.locale_text: "Что же, теперь вы знаете, что покупаете. Ситуация непростая, но, если вы окажете мне поддержку, вы забудете о том, что есть другие торговые узлы помимо Футфола. Потому что нигде у вас не будет более верных друзей, чем здесь".

languages.text: "Well, now you know what you're buying. The situation is difficult, but should you decide to offer your support, you'll forget about the existence of trading hubs other than Footfall. Because you won't have more loyal friends anywhere else."
languages.original_text: "Что же, теперь вы знаете, что покупаете. Ситуация непростая, но, если вы окажете мне поддержку, вы забудете о том, что есть другие торговые узлы помимо Футфола. Потому что нигде у вас не будет более верных друзей, чем здесь".

traits.locale_text: "Well, now you know what you're buying. The situation is difficult, but should you decide to offer your support, you'll forget about the existence of trading hubs other than Footfall. Because you won't have more loyal friends anywhere else."

"Well, now you know what you're buying. The situation is difficult, but should you decide to offer your support, you'll forget about the existence of trading hubs other than Footfall. Because you won't have more loyal friends anywhere else."

"Well, now you know what you're buying. The situation is difficult, but should you decide to offer your support, you'll forget about the existence of trading hubs other than Footfall. Because you won't have more loyal friends anywhere else."

"Well, now you know what you're buying. The situation is difficult, but should you decide to offer your support, you'll forget about the existence of trading hubs other than Footfall. Because you won't have more loyal friends anywhere else."

languages.text: 「これで何を買うのか分かっただろう。難しい状況だが、支援を申し出ることを決めたら、フットフォール以外の取引ハブの存在は忘れてしまうさ。これ以上忠実な友人は他にいないのだから」
languages.original_text: "Well, now you know what you're buying. The situation is difficult, but should you decide to offer your support, you'll forget about the existence of trading hubs other than Footfall. Because you won't have more loyal friends anywhere else."

traits.locale_text: 「これで何を買うのか分かっただろう。難しい状況だが、支援を申し出ることを決めたら、フットフォール以外の取引ハブの存在は忘れてしまうさ。これ以上忠実な友人は他にいないのだから」

languages.text: “很好，看来您已经明白当前的情况了。落脚港的情况很艰难，但如果您决定提供支持，您就可以把落脚港之外的贸易中心全都抛到脑后。因为无论您走到哪里，都不可能找到比落脚港更忠诚的朋友。”
languages.original_text: "Well, now you know what you're buying. The situation is difficult, but should you decide to offer your support, you'll forget about the existence of trading hubs other than Footfall. Because you won't have more loyal friends anywhere else."

traits.locale_text: “很好，看来您已经明白当前的情况了。落脚港的情况很艰难，但如果您决定提供支持，您就可以把落脚港之外的贸易中心全都抛到脑后。因为无论您走到哪里，都不可能找到比落脚港更忠诚的朋友。”

languages.text: «Bueno, ahora ya sabe lo que hay. La situación es aciaga, pero si decide prestarnos su ayuda, no querrá saber de otros puntos comerciales que no sean Paso. Más que nada porque no encontrará socios más leales en ningún otro sitio».
languages.original_text: "Well, now you know what you're buying. The situation is difficult, but should you decide to offer your support, you'll forget about the existence of trading hubs other than Footfall. Because you won't have more loyal friends anywhere else."

traits.locale_text: «Bueno, ahora ya sabe lo que hay. La situación es aciaga, pero si decide prestarnos su ayuda, no querrá saber de otros puntos comerciales que no sean Paso. Más que nada porque no encontrará socios más leales en ningún otro sitio».

languages.text: « Au moins, vous savez dans quoi vous vous embarquez. La situation est compliquée, mais si vous acceptez de nous aider, vous oublierez jusqu'à l'existence même des autres comptoirs commerciaux, parce que vous ne trouverez pas d'amis plus fidèles qu'à Castel. »
languages.original_text: "Well, now you know what you're buying. The situation is difficult, but should you decide to offer your support, you'll forget about the existence of trading hubs other than Footfall. Because you won't have more loyal friends anywhere else."

traits.locale_text: « Au moins, vous savez dans quoi vous vous embarquez. La situation est compliquée, mais si vous acceptez de nous aider, vous oublierez jusqu'à l'existence même des autres comptoirs commerciaux, parce que vous ne trouverez pas d'amis plus fidèles qu'à Castel. »

languages.text: "Nun, jetzt wisst Ihr, was Ihr kauft. Die Lage ist schwierig, aber solltet Ihr uns unterstützen, könnt Ihr alle Handelszentren neben Footfall vergessen. Ihr werdet dann nämlich nirgendwo sonst noch loyale Freunde haben."
languages.original_text: "Well, now you know what you're buying. The situation is difficult, but should you decide to offer your support, you'll forget about the existence of trading hubs other than Footfall. Because you won't have more loyal friends anywhere else."

traits.locale_text: "Nun, jetzt wisst Ihr, was Ihr kauft. Die Lage ist schwierig, aber solltet Ihr uns unterstützen, könnt Ihr alle Handelszentren neben Footfall vergessen. Ihr werdet dann nämlich nirgendwo sonst noch loyale Freunde haben."

languages.text: "Amiyane bir tabir olacak belki ama mal ortada. Durum zor lakin desteğinizi sunmaya karar verecek olursanız Binliman dışındaki ticaret merkezlerinin varlığını unutsanız yeridir. Zira daha sadık dostlara rastlayamayacaksınız."
languages.original_text: "Well, now you know what you're buying. The situation is difficult, but should you decide to offer your support, you'll forget about the existence of trading hubs other than Footfall. Because you won't have more loyal friends anywhere else."

traits.locale_text: "Mal dediğiniz gibi ortada. Durum zor, lakin desteğinizi sunmaya karar verirseniz Binliman dışındaki ticaret merkezlerinin varlığını unutsanız yeridir. Zira daha sadık dostlara rastlayamayacaksınız."
